annotations.title: Paloma | How to Drink

annotations.description: Five Easy Tequila Cocktails! I was really bummed to not have been able to get this video out for National Tequila Day, I try hard to get out videos for all t...
annotations.title: 5 Easy Tequila Cocktails

textContent:
2oz Tequila
3oz Grapefruit soda (Squirt)
4 Muddled lime quarters
2 Muddled grapefruit slices
6 Mint leaves

Build in glass
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxBjqBKDYcY

1.5oz (45ml) Blanco Tequila
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup
Top Mexican Squirt
Grapefruit Twist/or Wheel

Shake and pour in collins. Top with squirt. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DcW1BVlUvc
title: Paloma
